name: Scorpion Simulator
description:
Live the life of a Scorpion! Survive as a tiny arachnid on an island filled with giant plants, carnivores, and bugs! Start your own scorpion family, hunt down tasty insects, and battle for your life against deadly predators like snakes, birds, and spiders!

Download the Scorpion Simulator today while it's 50% OFF for a very limited time!

Game Features
+ REALISTIC SIMULATOR - You'll need to maintain your health, hunger, thirst, and energy if you're going to survive in the wild!
+ EPIC BATTLES - Use your powerful pinchers and poisonous stinger to fight dangerous animals and catch tasty insects!
+ START A FAMILY - Find a mate to bond with and raise your very own brood of scorpions to help you hunt! Watch your baby scorplings grow in size and assist you in combat!
+ LEVEL UP YOUR SCORPION - Gain experience by defeating other animals and level up your scorpions to increase their health, attack damage, and even unlock new attacks like the Poison Sting!
+ WILDERNESS SURVIVAL GUIDE - Look to your handy survival guide for information on enemy animals, a map of the world, scorpion customizations, and much more!
+ HUGE 3D ENVIRONMENT - Your scorpion is free to explore a massive open world of forests and caves! Crawl up trees, walls, and anything you see to find new enemies and hidden treasures!
+ NEW TOUCH-BASED CONTROLS - Brand new intuitive controls let you navigate your scorpion like never before! Pinch to zoom and play from your scorpion's perspective or get a bird's eye view of the action!
+ HD GRAPHICS - Stunning High Definition graphics will dazzle your display with beautiful views of a gigantic lush island!
+ GLUTEN-FREE PROMISE - With all of our games you will always get the full game with no ads or additional purchases!

Download the Scorpion Simulator and wield the venomous stinger and razor sharp claws of one of the most dangerous animals in the world, a Scorpion!
